entry.title: $2199 // True One Bdrm in the Heart of Crown Heights / C S 2 3 4 5 / No FEE
entry.content:
Please Read Carefully so there is No Misunderstanding!!

Qualifications
12 month lease is a Must!!
Good Credit and Income is a Must!! "40x Income and 680+ credit score"
Guarantor welcomed
Pet Friendly
LGBTQ Friendly

Hey everyone,

We have a Gorgeous Newly Renovated True One Bedroom in the Heart of Prime Crown Heights area. This Sunny Unit Includes

- Modern open face kitchen
- Stainless steel appliances ( Gas stove, and mini fridge)
- Wall to wall hard wood flooring
- High Ceiling w/ LED lighting
- Intercom system
- Decorative fireplace
- Over sized Bay window (plenty of Natural Sunlight)
- Bedroom can fit a full size, queen size bed comfortably
- Fully Tiled Bathroom w/ Stand up shower

Super Commuter Friendly Location. 20 mins commute to and from the city. Short walk to Franklin Ave C S Line and a 5 minute walk to Franklin Ave 2 3 4 5 Line, and all other mass transit. Also down the block from Franklin Ave which is filled tons of restaurants ( The Crabby Shack, Chavela's, Domo Taco), supermarkets, pop-up shops, craft stores, salons, banks, and so much more!! Bike friendly area minutes away from Prospect park, Brooklyn Museum, and Botanic Garden.

For more information or to schedule a showing contact me Julian @anytime!! (Contact info in photos)
